name: Spy
description: Although your capabilities are not much different from those o f a burglar or smuggler, you learned and practiced them in a very different context: as an espionage agent. You might have been an officially sanctioned agent o f the crown, or perhaps you sold the secrets you uncovered to the highest bidder.
equipment: A crowbar, dagger (2), pouch (2), disguise kit, traveler's clothes, 16 gp
